description:
For hotheads, this hat has a ventilating mesh liner in the crown. The shaped bill, and nylon panels offer protection from the sun.

  • Made of nylon Supplex® fabric in the front and top panels
  • TransAction headband wicks moisture
  • Shaped, plastic-stiffened bill offers shade and helps block glare
  • Quick-release buckle to adjust the fit
name: Outdoor Research Swift Cap - Unisex
